original_text: On the north side their boundary began at the Jordan, passed the northern slope of Jericho and headed west into the hill country, coming out at the wilderness of Beth Aven.
korean_text: 그들의 북방 경계는 요단에서부터 여리고 북쪽으로 올라가서 서쪽 산지를 넘어서 또 올라가서 벧아웬 황무지에 이르며

sentences.original_text: On the north side their boundary began at the Jordan
passed the northern slope of Jericho
and headed west into the hill country
coming out at the wilderness of Beth Aven
